title: Best Buy, Kroger, Snowflake, Tesla, Big Lots: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Snowflake’s sales outlook came in below expectations; Elon Musk said he was open to a UAW vote on organizing Tesla workers
body:
Stock futures edged up as crude continued its climb, topping $115 a barrel. Here’s what we’re watching in Thursday’s trading.
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
